item.description:
The Nerds are playing at Toad's Place this Friday, November 30th. The Nerds are a cover band that play a range of music from the 50s/60s to today. Their shows have always been a lot of fun!

Check them out:
The Nerds' Website

The show starts at 9 pm, but there are three opening bands so The Nerds will probably start playing around midnight. Tickets are $12 in advance, $15 at the door but you can usually find coupons for free admittance before 10/$5 after 10 around places in New Haven.

I (Andrea) can be a contact, but it is tough to talk on cell phones once bands start playing at Toad's. I can be reached for info earlier but after I get to the bar (around 10 pm), it may be tougher to reach me by phone. I wanted to post this as an event so people can see who else is going and we can try to meet up in the bar.

Info about Toad's Place:
Toad's Place website
item.name: Friday 11/30 - The Nerds at Toad's Place
